title: An Out-of-this-World Romance
overview: Li Qin Nan entered the world of novels and became Qiu Yu Ke, the daughter of Qiu Wen Shan, the minister of rituals, and was given in marriage to Ming Jing Chuan, a national teacher who was admired by all. As a result, Qiu Yu Ke, who never believed in love, and Ming Jing Chuan, who didn't know what it was, went from initial suspicion and disgust to later trust and love, and finally achieved personal growth and understood the true meaning of love.
